title: The Perfect Solution
description: Everyone loves three year old Brhin Teddi. His single mother, Catrine, loves him. His aunt and uncle and cousins love him. The teachers at his daycare center, the Perfect Solution, love him. And someone in the shadows, watching, following and planning, loves him so much she’s ready to destroy countless lives to have him and call him her son. A terrifying look into the world of childcare, its weaknesses and the terrible cost of those weaknesses.
author: Ey Wade
